tool_description: Free API to access NBI related Data. Get players, teams, games, stats, average data.
name: NBI Data
title: NBI Data

api_list.name: Get Game

optional_parameters.name: seasons
optional_parameters.description: An array of year.  i.e. putting 2019 will return all games that are in season 2019-2020.

optional_parameters.name: end_date
optional_parameters.description: Should be in `YYYY-MM-DD` format. Will query all games that occur on or before this date.

optional_parameters.name: postseason
optional_parameters.description: Will return all games the occur in postseason

optional_parameters.name: start_date
optional_parameters.description: Should be in `YYYY-MM-DD` format. Will query all games that occur on or after this date.

api_list.name: Get Season Average

optional_parameters.name: season
optional_parameters.description: The season year. i.e. putting 2019, will return the data of season 2019-2020.

optional_parameters.name: players
optional_parameters.description: Array of player ids. The player ids can be retrieve from /player api.

api_list.name: Get Stats
api_list.description: Get Game Stats or Player Stats

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The current page, used in navigating thru the list.

optional_parameters.name: postseason
optional_parameters.description: Retrieve the stats in postseason

optional_parameters.name: games
optional_parameters.description: Array of game ids. The game ids can be retrieve from /game api.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum of items to return per page, a max of 100

optional_parameters.name: players
optional_parameters.description: Array of player ids. The player ids can be retrieve from /player api.

optional_parameters.name: end_date
optional_parameters.description: Should be in `YYYY-MM-DD` format. This is used to retrieve data the occur on or before this date.

optional_parameters.name: start_date
optional_parameters.description: Should be in `YYYY-MM-DD` format. This is used to retrieve data the occur on or after this date.

api_list.name: Get Specific Team

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The current page, used for navigating thru the list

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: The team name. Can be a keyword. i.e. Golden (will return all teams with `golden` in their name)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum of items to return per page, a max of 100

api_list.name: Get Teams

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The current page, used for navigating thru the list

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum of items to return per page, a max of 100

api_list.name: Get Player

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: The player name to search. OPTIONAL. Leave blank to get all players.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The current page, used for navigating thru the list.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum of items to return per page, a maximum of 100
